column5: Sue was very emphatic, she didn't want a funeral of any sort but agreed that if I wanted to do something I could have a celebration of life (as long as it was kept simple). In keeping with her wishes:  Celebration of life for Sue Bignell Oct. 28, 2017 from 2 to 5 pm 9 Riverwood Park Rd. (Social Club) Lindsay, ON K9V 0K2
Would love to be there Cliff but Saturdays at this time of year are crazy for me.
I love that your celebrating her life cliff.  That's how Italians do it too.  Sorry again for your loss, but I hope you all have a good time and enjoy

Hi Cliff, Hope all is going as well as possible, would love to have been able to come Celebrate Sue's life with you all but unfortunately, we have a prior commitment but my prayers and thoughts will be with you and your family.
Cliff I have tried to send you a message but your OFC mailbox is full. Please clear it so I can get through to you.
Cliff I have tried to send you a message but your OFC mailbox is full. Please clear it so I can get through to you.  PM'd you alternative contact info.

For those that can't make it no worries, a kind thought or a prayer is plenty! That's all Sue would have wanted anyway.  For anyone that is coming DO NOT try coming up the 115/35 then 35 to Lindsay, Hwy 35 is closed for construction and the detour will add about 25 km to your trip. There is a shorter detour but it is not marked and involves a narrow country road.  My mailbox is now empty  Thanks again Simon!
If anyone from the west side of GTTA (Greater THAN Toronto Area) is interested in carpooling, shoot me a pm. I'll be leaving 1230ish.
Sorry for your loss cliff, Llori and I have you and you family in our prayers. That one afternoon with you and Sue left a lasting impression on both of us, your hospitality was greatly appreciated.

For those that can't make it no worries, a kind thought or a prayer is plenty! That's all Sue would have wanted anyway.  For anyone that is coming DO NOT try coming up the 115/35 then 35 to Lindsay, Hwy 35 is closed for construction and the detour will add about 25 km to your trip. There is a shorter detour but it is not marked and involves a narrow country road.  My mailbox is now empty  Thanks again Simon!  I read on Facebook that hwy. 35 south is now open (3 weeks ahead of schedule) as per St. Dave's Diner

I read on Facebook that hwy. 35 south is now open (3 weeks ahead of schedule) as per St. Dave's Diner   It is open as of yesterday morning.  Sorry I will not be able to stop by Cliff as the kids and I are at my folks place.
Sorry we won't be able to make it Cliff. Working weekends sucks!!!  S.
Our prayers and hearts are with Sue, your family and you today Big Cliff.
Thank you one and all, it was wonderful to see so many old friends and reflect on times gone by. I will be catching up with many of you in the next little while!
